description: Integrate Chrome DevTools MCP server with personas-mcp, enabling Ava (frontend specialist) and Lloyd (coordinator) to access browser debugging tools via MCP protocol.
goal: Enable AI agents (Ava and Lloyd) to inspect browser elements, console messages, network requests, and debug UI issues through the DevTools MCP server.
requirements: Add DevTools MCP server to .mcp.json configuration
Update Ava persona preferred_tools with DevTools MCP tools
Update Lloyd persona with DevTools MCP awareness
Create /debug-ui slash command for quick UI debugging workflow
out_of_scope: Full context expert integration with DevTools
constraints: Must work with existing persona system - no breaking changes
Chrome must be running with --remote-debugging-port for DevTools MCP to work
